DOC.detailed_description: Corticosteroid injection routinely give treat carpal tunnel syndrome . The objective study evaluate efficacy ultrasound guide corticosteroid injection reduce symptom cause carpal tunnel syndrome . In randomised clinical trial , 50 patient clinical electromyographic diagnosis mild moderate carpal tunnel syndrome recruit Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de Sherbrooke ( CHUS ) . Subjects randomise ultrasound guide blind injection group . All subject receive 40 mg methylprednisolone . The primary outcome Boston Carpal Tunnel Syndrome Questionnaire - Symptom Severity Scale baseline 3 month post injection . Both subject assessor blind .
